headline: Ask HN: Developers who switched from native development to Flutter, how is it?
description:
I have been developing apps for iOS and Android for about a decade (I am the developer of Hacker News client app HACK for iOS and Android). I originally started with Objective C and Java and then switched to Swift and Kotlin.

I am looking into trying out Flutter for the second time, so am curious how others who made the switch like it?

Also, has Flutter improved their web development? Last time I tried it, it was all a canvas which was drawing all elements instead of HTML elements. This seemed pretty bad for accessibility and SEO. Is that still the case?

How's accessibility for the iOS and Android apps built in Flutter?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 从原生开发转到Flutter的开发者们，你们觉得怎么样？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 從原生開發轉到Flutter的開發者們，你們覺得怎麼樣？
description_zh-Hans:
我已经为iOS和Android开发了大约十年的应用程序（我是Hacker News客户端应用程序HACK在iOS和Android的开发者）。

我正在考虑第二次尝试Flutter，所以我很好奇其他转换的人是如何喜欢它的？

另外，Flutter是否改善了他们的网络开发？上一次我尝试使用它时，它只是一个画布，而不是 HTML 元素。这似乎对可访问性和SEO相当不利。现在还是这样吗？

在Flutter中构建的iOS和Android应用程序的可访问性如何？
description_zh-Hant:
我已經為iOS和Android開發了大約十年的應用程序（我是Hacker News客戶端應用程序HACK在iOS和Android的開發者）。

我正在考慮第二次嘗試Flutter，所以我很好奇其他轉換的人是如何喜歡它的？

另外，Flutter是否改善了他們的網絡開發？上一次我嘗試使用它時，它只是一個畫布，而不是 HTML 元素。這似乎對可訪問性和SEO相當不利。現在還是這樣嗎？

在Flutter中構建的iOS和Android應用程序的可訪問性如何？
